title: Do The Time Warp — Laverne Cox Will Star In ‘Rocky Horror Picture Show’ TV Reboot
text: Do The Time Warp — Laverne Cox Will Star In ‘Rocky Horror Picture Show’ TV Reboot Thursday, 22 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) Lee Daniels May Have Another New Show Coming to FOX 00:48 Fox is looking for the next big idea from the man who brought them and television viewers the blessing that is Cookie Lyon. The network has officially given a pilot order to STAR, a new show from Lee Daniels that he first dropped hints about over the summer. The show — which the 'Empire' creator... Recent related news Laverne Cox has landed a major role in the upcoming Fox television remake of The Rocky Horror Picture Show! According to EW, the 31-year-old Orange is the New... Just Jared 1 hour ago - Entertainment The Orange Is the New Black actress will play Dr. Frank-N-Furter People Magazine 2 hours ago - Celebrities Laverne Cox already made history as the first transgender actor to receive an Emmy nomination. Now the Orange Is The New Black standout is breaking new ground... Deadline Hollywood 2 hours ago - US Following a lengthy casting process, Fox has found the star of its upcoming Rocky Horror Picture Show. Orange Is the New Black star Laverne Cox will... Billboard.com 2 hours ago - Entertainment Fox’s “Rocky Horror Picture Show” is a go as “Orange Is the New Black” star Laverne Cox joins the cast, lifting the cast contingency on the project... The Wrap 2 hours ago - US Dr. Frank N. Furter has been found! Earlier this year, Fox announced plans to celebrate the 40th anniversary of The Rocky Horror Picture Show with a 2-hour TV... Perez Hilton 5 hours ago - Celebrities Patricia Quinn and Nell Campbell also do the Time Warp again. Digital Spy 1 week ago - Celebrities You Might Like
